post: I am now an Assistant Professor in the CS dept at Western University in London, Ontario, Canada!
I will be in Singapore between 28 and 30 April, inclusive. Feel free to reach out! I am also organizing the AABI 2025 symposium on the 29th.

I gave a talk at UBC's first-year seminar in science (SCIE 113). I talked about the high-level intuition of probabilistic decision-making algorithms and their impacts in making the world a better place.
Hello, world! I'm starting this news section!
